original_text: You said many proud things to insult me. You thought that you were greater than me. I heard everything that you said!
korean_text: 너희가 나를 대적하여 입으로 자랑하며 나를 대적하여 여러 가지로 말한 것을 내가 들었노라

sentences.original_text: You said many proud things to insult me.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 나를 모욕하기 위해 많은 교만한 말을 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: You thought that you were greater than me.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 자신이 나보다 더 위대하다고 생각했습니다.

sentences.original_text: I heard everything that you said!
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신이 말한 모든 것을 들었습니다!
